info.name: Sprint 2
info.description:
This API is divided by user stories, each user story has a succesfull request, and several failed ones so that you can try the exceptions.

In the folder "Test Our API" you have the path to sucessfully create all you need to then test the API.  
  
It also involves the endpoint to test validations.

item.name: Empty field, Wrong value, Wrong number
Success list posts from followed last 2 weeks
Success list followed posts by date asc
Success list followed posts by date desc
